description: ff. 310 (fol. l is missing; begins with the second faṣl of kitāb al-ṭahārah) 297 x 208; 225 x 133 mm. 31 lin. Ramaḍān 1024. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 503 (no. l, Ausz.); S I, 688 confuses this work with the authorʼs Zād al-mustaqniʻ; al-Iqnāʻ is an independent work, not an abridgment of Ibn Qudāmahʼs al-Muqniʻ. Mss. is incomplete.
author: ḥujāwī, Mūsá ibn Aḥmad, d. 1560
title: al-Iqnāʻ fī furūʻ madhhab al-Imām Aḥmad
creator: ḥujāwī, Mūsá ibn Aḥmad, d. 1560
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
